name: dustily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is covered in or full of dust: Some old fans were hanging dustily from the ceiling. The museum houses a rather dustily displayed collection of sculptures. Related word
dusty
More examplesFewer examplesPiles of old books lay dustily on the shelves.Weak sunlight filtered dustily through the blinds.He opened his hand and sifted the soil dustily between his fingers.The film transports us into a dustily attractive landscape.The road climbed dustily into the mountains.
